meta.name: Ali Khaled Alhussein
meta.jobTitle: Front-End Web Developer: Creating web apps using ReactJS, Next.js, and Angular
meta.summary:
I am a fresh software engineering graduate specializing in web development with 3 years of experience, by self-learning, and I am seeking new opportunities in the field. and I am a committed, motivated, creative, and dedicated professional.

I've built many web applications and websites through my self-learning journey since 2019. Additionally, I participated in ICPC at the local level and got 12th place in the Aleppo University contest in 2019. Finally, I got 1st place with my graduation project in the semester of spring 2022.

I am skilled in front-end web development using ReactJS and Next.js. Additionally, WordPress development using page builders like Elementor and Theme development from scratch.

responsibilities: Creating user-friendly and mobile-based web application.
Creating, editing and maintaining WordPress websites.
Managing web servers, c-panels, webmail, domain names, backups, ...etc.

projects.name: Pinfo
projects.caption: This is a social media application that I created in 2022.
projects.description: This is a social media application for sharing photos that I created in 2022. It comes with elegant and modern user interfaces, it allows users to register with a Google account, and then share photos, comment on them, and search as well. I am proud of this application and the knowledge that I gained during its implementation.

projects.name: CVT Platform
projects.caption: This is a web application that I created as graduation project in 2022
projects.description: This is a web application that I created in 2022, which is a very significant platform as it helps job seekers to build their resumes and e-portfolios. And since it was my graduation project, I spent a lot of effort on it from analyzing the system to designing diagrams until building the final app. I am so delighted about it and about its final result.

projects.name: Next Events
projects.caption: This is a web application that I created in 2022 for publishing events.
projects.description: This is a web application that I created in 2022. Which is a simple and cool space to publish upcoming events with the ability to add comments and make discussions.

projects.name: Meals App
projects.caption: This is a meal ordering and delivery application that I created in 2021.
projects.description: This is a meal ordering and delivery application that I created in 2021. it comes with modern and interactive user interfaces. It's able to manage orders in real time.

projects.name: 4G Team Website
projects.caption: This is a web application that I created in 2019 for Ebla Private university students in Aleppo.
projects.description: This is a web application that I created in 2019 for Ebla Private university students in Aleppo, which is designed in a simple and easy-to-use manner to help university students browse and download lectures at any time they want. I also feel proud that I offer this service to my colleagues completely free of charge.

accomplishments.name: Graduation Project
accomplishments.description: First place with my graduation projects in the semester of spring 2022 with a grade of 95

accomplishments.name: ICPC ACM
accomplishments.description: 12th place in the collegiate programming contest ACM - University of Aleppo.
